text: Gladkovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Zaboryinskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 10 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located on the Sharlanka River, 3.5 km south-west from Beryozovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Gladkovo
